channel.title: Flamers vs Gamers
channel.description: Who do you think is better the people who play the games in peace, or the ones who flame it.

item.title: Flamers vs Gamers

item.title: Flamers vs Gamers
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:12, topic:347630”][quote author=rain1994 link=topic=444012.msg3260546#msg3260546 date=1278458989]

Flamers are funny, especially squeeky american 10 year olds.
[/quote]Ages 10-12 are funny, ages 9- are just flat out annoying

not to mention they’re like the annoying orange on steroids

Very very very true i watched the annoying orange on youtube for like 45 seconds couldnt take it anymore.

I watched Fred one time… Went to Shane Dawson as soon as I heard “hey guys its freeeeeeeeedddd!!!”.[/quote]

I also watched fred one time made me rethink life in general this is what it came out to " why god did you create something so impossibly stupid like fred?"

Read full topic

item.title: Flamers vs Gamers
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

I hate it when (in my case Metal Gear Online) people who are higher level (or more skilled) always tbag or complain over the microphone. Either accuse of lag or being a glitcher. I also hate it when people can never be friendly when playing online.

Read full topic

item.title: Flamers vs Gamers
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The ones who accept the game as is. If you are going to just flame a game you have, then why don’t you throw it away and call it done and over? Its never good to complain about something that YOU bought, when you could have done some research and knew about it before you bought it.

Read full topic
